United in Stormwind.name: Devouring Swarm
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]Choose an enemy minion.
Your minions attack it,
then return any that die
 to your hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Collect… essence.

United in Stormwind.name: Hot Streak
United in Stormwind.text: Your next Fire spell this turn costs (2) less.
United in Stormwind.flavor: It's easy to catch fire when you're on fire.

United in Stormwind.name: Provoke
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable Choose a friendly minion. Enemy minions attack it.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. I will crush you!"

United in Stormwind.name: Blackwater Cutlass
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable After you Trade this, reduce the Cost of a spell in your hand by (1).
United in Stormwind.flavor: Popular around Stormwind for slashing prices.

United in Stormwind.name: Blessed Goods
United in Stormwind.text: Discover a Secret, weapon, or Divine Shield minion.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Guaranteed to contain no haunted dolls, cursed rings, or corrupted runeblades, or your money back.

United in Stormwind.name: Call of the Grave
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Discover a Deathrattle minion. If you have enough Mana to play it, trigger its Deathrattle.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Necromancy is motivational speaking for the dead.

United in Stormwind.name: Command the Elements
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Questline: Play 3 cards with Overload. Reward: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
United in Stormwind.flavor: What, you expected a shaman to have trouble with a place called STORMWIND?

United in Stormwind.name: Defend the Dwarven District
United in Stormwind.text: Questline: Deal damage with 3 spells. Reward: Your Hero Power can target minions.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Don't shoot until you see the purples of their eyes.

United in Stormwind.name: Druid of the Reef
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Choose One - Transform into a 3/1 Shark with Rush; or a 1/3 Turtle with Taunt.
United in Stormwind.flavor: “Wow, there’s a whole sunken city down here!”

United in Stormwind.name: Elwynn Boar
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Deathrattle: If you had 7 Elwynn Boars die this game, equip a 15/3 Sword of a ___Thousand Truths.@ (@/7)
United in Stormwind.flavor: Be grateful we lowered the requirement from 65,340,285.
United in Stormwind.howToGetGold: Unlocked with "That Which Has No Life" Achievement.

United in Stormwind.name: Final Showdown
United in Stormwind.text: Questline: Draw 4 cards in one turn. Reward: Reduce the Cost of the cards drawn by (1).
United in Stormwind.flavor: Finally. The last Hearthstone card.

United in Stormwind.name: Find the Imposter
United in Stormwind.text: Questline: Play 2 SI:7 cards. Reward: Add a Spy Gizmo to your hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: My money is on the evil advisor to the king.

United in Stormwind.name: First Flame
United in Stormwind.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Add a Second Flame to your hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: You never forget your first love: fire.

United in Stormwind.name: Investment Opportunity
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Draw an Overload card.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "It's a real fixer-upper. I mean a REAL fixer upper."

United in Stormwind.name: Leatherworking Kit
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]After three friendly
Beasts die, draw a Beast
and give it +1/+1.
Lose 1 Durability.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Combining taxidermy and tailoring.

United in Stormwind.name: Lost in the Park
United in Stormwind.text: Questline: Gain 4 Attack with your hero. Reward: Gain 5 Armor.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Mister, have you seen my Archdruid?

United in Stormwind.name: Metamorfin
United in Stormwind.text: Taunt Battlecry: If you've cast a Fel spell this turn, gain +2/+2.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Always wanted to be the green ranger.

United in Stormwind.name: Overdraft
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals to deal that much damage.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Wait. It costs mana to be out of mana?!

United in Stormwind.name: Parrrley
United in Stormwind.text: Swap this for a card in your opponent's deck.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Time to engage in some unfriendly negotiations.

United in Stormwind.name: Peasant
United in Stormwind.text: At the start of your turn, draw a card.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Better pay them, or they'll join the Defias.

United in Stormwind.name: Prismatic Jewel Kit
United in Stormwind.text: [x]After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give minions in your hand +1/+1. Lose 1 Durability.
United in Stormwind.flavor: The divine trick to jewelcrafting is tumbling your own rocks.

United in Stormwind.name: Raid the Docks
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Questline: Play 3 Pirates. Reward: Draw a weapon.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Winning the annual Ratchet Regatta really went to their heads.

United in Stormwind.name: Rise to the Occasion
United in Stormwind.text: Questline: Play 3 different 1-Cost cards. Reward: Equip a 1/4 Light's Justice.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Faith is never lost, only repurposed.

United in Stormwind.name: Seek Guidance
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Questline: Play a 2, 3, and 4-Cost card. Reward: Discover a card from your deck.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Xyrella was looking for spiritual guidance but found deck-building tips instead.

United in Stormwind.name: Shadowblade Slinger
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've taken damage this turn, deal that _much to an enemy minion.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Throwing knives isn’t easy for a warlock. It’s quite painful, in fact.

United in Stormwind.name: Shadowcloth Needle
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]After you cast a Shadow
spell, deal 1 damage
to all enemies.
Lose 1 Durability.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Makes light of the darkest repair jobs.

United in Stormwind.name: Shard of the Naaru
United in Stormwind.text: Tradeable Silence all enemy minions.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Fell from the sky, huh? I'll give you ten gold.

United in Stormwind.name: Shiver Their Timbers!
United in Stormwind.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you control a Pirate, deal $5 instead.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Who knew there was overlap between pirates and lumberjacks?

United in Stormwind.name: SI:7 Extortion
United in Stormwind.text: Tradeable Deal $3 damage to an undamaged character.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "It's a dangerous world out there. It'd be a shame if your protection insurance were to suddenly run out…"

United in Stormwind.name: Sigil of Alacrity
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]At the start of your next
turn, draw a card and
_reduce its Cost by (1).
United in Stormwind.flavor: Red means stop. Purple means GO REALLY FAST.

United in Stormwind.name: Sorcerer's Gambit
United in Stormwind.text: Questline: Cast a Fire, Frost, and Arcane spell. Reward: Draw a spell.
United in Stormwind.flavor: After "the incident," the Stockades really had to reevaluate their anti-mage protocols.

United in Stormwind.name: Sow the Soil
United in Stormwind.text: Choose One - Give your minions +1 Attack; or_ Summon a 2/2 Treant.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "I'M NOT A TAILOR!"

United in Stormwind.name: Stockades Guard
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Taunt.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "You there! Defend this prison with your life. It's my break."

United in Stormwind.name: The Demon Seed
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Questline: Take 10 damage on your turns. Reward: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Just need some elbow grease to get this working. Oh, and your soul.

United in Stormwind.name: Touch of the Nathrezim
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to a
minion. If it dies, restore
3 Health to your hero.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "You're giving your soul to me? I'm touched."

United in Stormwind.name: Vibrant Squirrel
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 4 Acorns into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/1 Squirrel.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Oh, they're cute now. Just wait till they unleash a Savage Roar.

United in Stormwind.name: Voidtouched Attendant
United in Stormwind.text: Both heroes take one extra damage from all sources.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Don't TOUCH the Void. You don't know where it's been.

United in Stormwind.name: Wicked Shipment
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable Summon @ 1/1 |4(Imp, Imps). (Upgrades by 2 when Traded!)
United in Stormwind.flavor: All horns on deck!

United in Stormwind.name: Auctioneer Jaxon
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Whenever you Trade, Discover a card from your _deck to draw instead.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Who's up for a brand-new wisp? This thing's in perfect condition, folks! Never been played..."

United in Stormwind.name: Auctionhouse Gavel
United in Stormwind.text: [x]After your hero attacks, reduce the Cost of a Battlecry minion in your hand by (1).
United in Stormwind.flavor: "I want to be a judge! Or an auctioneer! Look, all I want is one of those sweet, tiny hammers."

United in Stormwind.name: Bloodbound Imp
United in Stormwind.text: Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to your_hero.
United in Stormwind.flavor: ALWAYS read the terms and conditions.

United in Stormwind.name: Bolner Hammerbeak
United in Stormwind.text: [x]After you play a Battlecry minion, repeat the first __Battlecry played this turn._
United in Stormwind.flavor: Show him how to do something once, and he can do it a thousand times. This turn.

United in Stormwind.name: Celestial Ink Set
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]After you spend 5 Mana on
spells, reduce the Cost of a
spell in your hand by (5).
Lose 1 Durability.
United in Stormwind.flavor:
"Dear Mother,
I have a lot of spells and burst in my hand. You should maybe run more armor and healing next time.
Cordially,
Your child"

United in Stormwind.name: City Tax
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable Lifesteal. Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Look pal, I don't care what kind of legion you saved the world from, pay up or else."

United in Stormwind.name: Composting
United in Stormwind.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Draw __a card."
United in Stormwind.flavor: The Treants really give their bodies to the cause.

United in Stormwind.name: Deeprun Engineer
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Discover a Mech. It costs (1) less.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Deeprun Tram instructions: 300,000 pieces, 600,000 steps.

United in Stormwind.name: Defias Leper
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Shadow spell, deal 2 damage.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Do NOT eat Cookie’s Seafood Surprise.

United in Stormwind.name: Doggie Biscuit
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable Give a minion +2/+3. After you Trade this, give a friendly minion Rush.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Reserved for Edwin’s favorite lapdogs.

United in Stormwind.name: Encumbered Pack Mule
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Taunt When you draw this, add a _copy of it to your hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Now I can pick up EVERY knick-knack."
United in Stormwind.howToGetGold: Unlocked with "They Carry My Potions" Achievement.

United in Stormwind.name: Fel Barrage
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to
the lowest Health
enemy, twice.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Kurtrus leapt over a tombstone towards the demonic invaders, yelling "PEW! PEW!" as he shot them down with fel magic.

United in Stormwind.name: Florist
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
reduce the Cost of a Nature
_spell in your hand by (1).
United in Stormwind.flavor:
Trade district.
Trade district a shop.
Color Legendary.
Color Legendary golden.
Rose is a rose is a rose is a rose.

United in Stormwind.name: Garrote
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to the
enemy hero. Shuffle 3
Bleeds into your deck that
deal $2 more when drawn.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "I don't have money… but what I do have is a particular set of skills."

United in Stormwind.name: Harbor Scamp
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Hey, that gnome looks awfully fishy…

United in Stormwind.name: Ignite
United in Stormwind.text:
Deal $@ damage. Shuffle an Ignite into
your deck that deals
one more damage.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "So there I was in the Deadmines, I had VanCleef by the throat, and I was just about to let him have it when... <sniff> What's that smell?"

United in Stormwind.name: Jerry Rig Carpenter
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Draw a Choose One spell and split it.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Choose Two – Good; Cheap; or Fast.

United in Stormwind.name: Maestra of the Masquerade
United in Stormwind.text: You start the game as a different class until you play a Rogue card.
United in Stormwind.flavor: She doesn't drop character until after the DVD commentary.

United in Stormwind.name: Mailbox Dancer
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a Coin to your hand. Deathrattle: Give your opponent one.
United in Stormwind.flavor: He is the reason why we have 7 mailboxes in this district.
United in Stormwind.howToGetGold: Unlocked with "Toss a Coin to Your Dancer" Achievement.

United in Stormwind.name: Man the Cannons
United in Stormwind.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and $1 damage to all other minions.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Now THAT’S a lotta splash damage!

United in Stormwind.name: Moonlit Guidance
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Discover a copy of a card in your deck. If you play it this turn, draw the original.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Guff always makes the best decisions after 2 AM.

United in Stormwind.name: Noble Mount
United in Stormwind.text: G[x]ive a minion +1/+1 and Divine Shield. When it dies, summon a Warhorse.
United in Stormwind.flavor: The Horde rued the day that Cariel was allowed to take her pet to work.

United in Stormwind.name: Pandaren Importer
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell that didn't start in your deck.
United in Stormwind.flavor: She carries everything you didn't want and more!
United in Stormwind.howToGetGold: Unlocked with "Forgot This At Home" Achievement.

United in Stormwind.name: Prestor's Pyromancer
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Your next Fire spell has Spell Damage +2.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Ah, yeah. This guy. Definitely not an evil dragon in disguise either.

United in Stormwind.name: SI:7 Skulker
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Stealth Battlecry: The next card __you draw costs (1) less.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Burying bones and calling it skullduggery.

United in Stormwind.name: Stockades Prisoner
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Starts Dormant. After you play 3 cards, this awakens.
United in Stormwind.flavor: She was arrested for lockpicking. Her imprisonment was not well thought out.

United in Stormwind.name: Twilight Deceptor
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: If any hero took damage this turn, draw a Shadow spell.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Nobody asks questions if you're carrying a clipboard.

United in Stormwind.name: Wickerclaw
United in Stormwind.text:
After your hero gains Attack, this minion
gains +2 Attack.
United in Stormwind.flavor: They say pets tend to look like their owners.

United in Stormwind.name: Aimed Shot
United in Stormwind.text: Deal $3 damage. Your next Hero Power deals 2 more damage.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Wait, you WEREN'T aiming before?!

United in Stormwind.name: Alliance Bannerman
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a minion. Give minions in your hand +1/+1.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Back in my day, we had to carry our inspiration uphill both ways to war.

United in Stormwind.name: Amulet of Undying
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable Resurrect @ friendly Deathrattle |4(minion, minions). (Upgrades when Traded!)
United in Stormwind.flavor: Didn't seem to work out too well for this guy.

United in Stormwind.name: Brilliant Macaw
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Repeat the last Battlecry you played.
United in Stormwind.flavor: He's been repeating the same shanty for a month. Four pirates walked the plank last week. Middle of the ocean, just walked right off.

United in Stormwind.name: Cargo Guard
United in Stormwind.text: At the end of your turn, gain 3 Armor.
United in Stormwind.flavor: *Arrrrrmor

United in Stormwind.name: Catacomb Guard
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to an enemy minion.
United in Stormwind.flavor: A little dark down here. So much for "serving the Light."

United in Stormwind.name: Chaos Leech
United in Stormwind.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. Outcast: Deal $5 instead.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Otherwise known as a nematode.

United in Stormwind.name: Charged Call
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Discover a @-Cost minion and summon it. (Upgraded for each Overload card you played this game!)
United in Stormwind.flavor: You have a collect call from "AL'AKIR, LORD OF AIR AND THE FOUR WINDS." Do you accept these charges?

United in Stormwind.name: Cookie the Cook
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Lifesteal Deathrattle: Equip a 2/3 __Stirring Rod with Lifesteal._
United in Stormwind.flavor: Unsurprisingly, "Seafood Surprise" was no one's favorite dish.

United in Stormwind.name: Copycat
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Add a copy of the next card your opponent plays to your hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Whatever you do, DON’T let two of them meet.

United in Stormwind.name: Crow's Nest Lookout
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to the left and right-most enemy minions.
United in Stormwind.flavor: The extra eyes means he sees extra good.

United in Stormwind.name: Defias Cannoneer
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
deal 2 damage to a
random enemy twice.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "... three."

United in Stormwind.name: Dreaded Mount
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]Give a minion +1/+1.
When it dies, summon
an endless Dreadsteed.
United in Stormwind.flavor: This is the summoning that never ends, and it goes on and on my friends...

United in Stormwind.name: Enthusiastic Banker
United in Stormwind.text: [x]At the end of your turn, store a card from your deck. Deathrattle: Add the stored cards to your hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: She offers 0% interest.

United in Stormwind.name: Entrapped Sorceress
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a _Quest, Discover a spell.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "If you're a city guard, you have to tell me. Otherwise, it's entrapment."

United in Stormwind.name: Flightmaster Dungar
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a flightpath and go Dormant. Awaken with a bonus __when you complete it!
United in Stormwind.flavor: Flight’s a little bumpy, but there’s plenty of legroom.
United in Stormwind.howToGetGold: Unlockable after purchasing the United in Stormwind Tavern Pass.

United in Stormwind.name: Golakka Glutton
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Beast and gain +1/+1.
United in Stormwind.flavor: We lost our last cook to one of these.

United in Stormwind.name: Heavy Plate
United in Stormwind.text: Tradeable Gain 8 Armor.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "You asked for unbendable, unwavering armor–I don't see why you're upset."

United in Stormwind.name: Impatient Shopkeep
United in Stormwind.text: Tradeable Rush
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Oi! This ain't a museum, lady."

United in Stormwind.name: Lightbringer's Hammer
United in Stormwind.text: Lifesteal Can't attack heroes.
United in Stormwind.flavor: This entire city must be purged. Or at least just the minions.

United in Stormwind.name: Lion's Frenzy
United in Stormwind.text: Has Attack equal to the number of cards you've drawn this turn.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Only as sharp as your draw.

United in Stormwind.name: Loan Shark
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Give your opponent a Coin. __Deathrattle: You get two.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Pay up or you'll be swimming with the fishes.

United in Stormwind.name: Nobleman
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Create a Golden copy of a random card in your hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: What class are you? 'Upper.'

United in Stormwind.name: Northshire Farmer
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Shuffle three 3/3 copies_into_your_deck.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Dual-classed into Farmer/Rancher.

United in Stormwind.name: Oracle of Elune
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]After you play a minion
that costs (2) or less,
summon a copy of it.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Even the moon goddess needs to back up her databases.

United in Stormwind.name: Package Runner
United in Stormwind.text: Can only attack if you have at least 8 cards in hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: He could go... all... the... way!

United in Stormwind.name: Psyfiend
United in Stormwind.text: After you cast a Shadow spell, deal 2 damage to each hero.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Listens to a LOT of K-pop.

United in Stormwind.name: Ramming Mount
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Give a minion +2/+2 and Immune while attacking. When it dies, summon a Ram.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Tavish has some road rage issues to work through.

United in Stormwind.name: Righteous Defense
United in Stormwind.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1. Give the stats it lost to a minion in your hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Paladins... Always stealing someone else’s thunder. And stats.

United in Stormwind.name: Rustrot Viper
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Poisonous to weapons.
United in Stormwind.howToGetGold: Unlocked with "Snakes on a Blade" Achievement.

United in Stormwind.name: SI:7 Operative
United in Stormwind.text: Rush After this attacks a minion, gain Stealth.
United in Stormwind.flavor: What do you mean you're out of ponies?

United in Stormwind.name: Stormwind Freebooter
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Just don't stab the ankles! I want his boots!"

United in Stormwind.name: Stormwind Piper
United in Stormwind.text:
After this minion attacks,
give your Beasts +1/+1.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Throws crazy parties with the Rat King—except when it's raining.

United in Stormwind.name: Traveling Merchant
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly _minion you control.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Northrend's greatest export: funnel cakes.

United in Stormwind.name: Two-Faced Investor
United in Stormwind.text: [x]At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a card in your hand by (1). (50% chance to increase.)
United in Stormwind.flavor: Should never have opened that joint account...

United in Stormwind.name: Blacksmithing Hammer
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable After you Trade this, _gain +2 Durability.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Passed through the hands of countless smiths, and eventually the skulls of their enemies.

United in Stormwind.name: Canal Slogger
United in Stormwind.text: Rush, Lifesteal Overload: (1)
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Another Monday in the canals huh? What a slog."

United in Stormwind.name: Cheesemonger
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]Whenever your opponent
casts a spell, add a random
spell with the same Cost
to your hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Secretly, the Big Cheese of SI:7.

United in Stormwind.name: Counterfeit Blade
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain a random friendly Deathrattle that _triggered this game.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Don't worry, the blade retracts into the handle!

United in Stormwind.name: Dark Alley Pact
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]Summon a Fiend
with stats equal to
your hand size.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "With your help, I can finally install some proper lighting in this alley."

United in Stormwind.name: Deepwater Evoker
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell. Gain Armor equal to its Cost.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Cap'n! We've hit an iceberg! ...No, it’s not my fault!"

United in Stormwind.name: Demonic Assault
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Deal $3 damage. Summon two 1/3 Voidwalkers with Taunt.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Right next to the demonic pepper.

United in Stormwind.name: Edwin, Defias Kingpin
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card. If you play it this turn, gain +2/+2 and repeat this effect.
United in Stormwind.flavor: He’s not going to tear down the walls of Stormwind sitting around in the Hall of Fame.

United in Stormwind.name: Felgorger
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Draw a Fel spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
United in Stormwind.flavor: The 'everything green' diet.

United in Stormwind.name: Fire Sale
United in Stormwind.text: Tradeable Deal $3 damage to all minions.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Everything is 50% off now that our warehouse burned down.

United in Stormwind.name: First Blade of Wrynn
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Divine Shield Battlecry: Gain Rush if this has at least 4 Attack.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Valedictorian of knight school.

United in Stormwind.name: Granite Forgeborn
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand and deck by (1).
United in Stormwind.flavor: If he stops being useful, just turn him into a kitchen countertop.

United in Stormwind.name: Guild Trader
United in Stormwind.text: Tradeable Spell Damage +2
United in Stormwind.flavor: Somehow, she manages six different professions.

United in Stormwind.name: Hullbreaker
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Draw a spell. Your hero takes damage equal to its Cost.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Breaks through the hard shell to reach the ship's gooey interior.

United in Stormwind.name: Kodo Mount
United in Stormwind.text: Give a minion +4/+2 and Rush. When it dies, summon a Kodo.
United in Stormwind.flavor: No matter how big they are or how many times you tell them no, they STILL won't stay off the couch.

United in Stormwind.name: Monstrous Parrot
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Repeat the last friendly Deathrattle that triggered.
United in Stormwind.flavor: What kind of crackers are you feeding that thing?

United in Stormwind.name: Multicaster
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card for _each different spell school_ _you've cast this game.@ (@)
United in Stormwind.flavor: Has a questionable talent tree.

United in Stormwind.name: Park Panther
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Somebody called animal control once. It didn't work out very well for anybody.

United in Stormwind.name: Persistent Peddler
United in Stormwind.text: Tradeable Deathrattle: Summon a Persistent Peddler from your deck.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Loves pyramid schemes and bike rides.

United in Stormwind.name: Remote-Controlled Golem
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]After this takes damage,
shuffle two Golem Parts into
your deck. When drawn,
__summon a 2/1 Mech.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Someone got a little too excited inventing a can opener.

United in Stormwind.name: Rodent Nest
United in Stormwind.text: Deathrattle: Summon five 1/1 Rats.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Pig sty? No, this is a rat's nest.

United in Stormwind.name: Royal Librarian
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Silence a minion.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Books on how to flip the Auction House are down that way.

United in Stormwind.name: SI:7 Informant
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other SI:7 card you've played this game.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Sitting in a tavern all day and looking scary is hard work, but somebody has to do it.

United in Stormwind.name: Sketchy Information
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Draw a Deathrattle card that costs (4) or less. Trigger its Deathrattle.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "I trust the Forsaken as far as I can smell them. Which, I guess is actually pretty far."

United in Stormwind.name: Spice Bread Baker
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Restore Health to your hero equal to your hand size.
United in Stormwind.flavor: The secret ingredient is love. And a LOT of butter.

United in Stormwind.name: Spirit Alpha
United in Stormwind.text: [x]After you play a card with Overload, summon a 2/3 Spirit Wolf with Taunt.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Just like in the natural world, the alpha of the species is bright purple.

United in Stormwind.name: Stubborn Suspect
United in Stormwind.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
United in Stormwind.flavor: He keeps saying "I'll never talk," but no one has actually asked him anything.

United in Stormwind.name: Suckerhook
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
transform your weapon into
one that costs (1) more.
United in Stormwind.flavor: A moderately better dining companion than Suckerbeard.

United in Stormwind.name: Sunwing Squawker
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Repeat the last spell you've cast on a __friendly minion on this.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Most parrots repeat curses, not blessings.

United in Stormwind.name: Void Shard
United in Stormwind.text: Lifesteal Deal $4 damage.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Light's easy. Void's hard.

United in Stormwind.name: Arcane Overflow
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]Deal $8 damage to an
enemy minion. Summon a
 Remnant with stats equal
to the excess damage.
United in Stormwind.flavor: On this ship, when you can’t use an int, learn how to float.

United in Stormwind.name: Darkbishop Benedictus
United in Stormwind.text: Start of Game: If the spells in your deck are all Shadow, enter Shadowform.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Dark Bishop takes Light Pawn, check.
United in Stormwind.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 25 United in Stormwind Legendary cards.

United in Stormwind.name: Defias Blastfisher
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Repeat for each of your Beasts.
United in Stormwind.flavor: She's a dynamite fishing trainer.

United in Stormwind.name: Imported Tarantula
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders with Poisonous and Rush.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Which forbidden forest did you get this from?

United in Stormwind.name: Lion's Guard
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 15 or less Health, gain +2/+4 and Taunt.
United in Stormwind.flavor: She takes the lion's share of the credit, too.

United in Stormwind.name: Need for Greed
United in Stormwind.text: Tradeable Draw 3 cards. If drawn this turn, this costs (3).
United in Stormwind.flavor: Sorry guys, I TOTALLY meant to click greed.

United in Stormwind.name: Runed Mithril Rod
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]After you draw 4 cards,
reduce the Cost of cards
in your hand by (1).
Lose 1 Durability.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Please, I need these greens to disenchant them." —Every Enchanter Ever

United in Stormwind.name: Sanctum Chandler
United in Stormwind.text: After you cast a Fire spell, draw a spell.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Has been burning at both ends to keep the place illuminated.

United in Stormwind.name: Shady Bartender
United in Stormwind.text: Tradeable Battlecry: Give your Demons +2/+2.
United in Stormwind.flavor: One sin and tonic, coming right up.

United in Stormwind.name: Stormwind Guard
United in Stormwind.text: Taunt Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1.
United in Stormwind.flavor: 1% Guarding, 99% providing directions.

United in Stormwind.name: The Rat King
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Revive after 5 friendly minions die.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "I'm the giant rat that makes all of da rules!"

United in Stormwind.name: Wealth Redistributor
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: Swap the Attack of the highest and lowest Attack minion.
United in Stormwind.flavor:
WOULD YE LIKE CASH BACK?
[  ] YAR HAR        [  ] YO HO

United in Stormwind.name: Anetheron
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Costs (1) if your hand is full.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Leads every demonic invasion. Hopefully this one turns out better than the World Tree.

United in Stormwind.name: Battleground Battlemaster
United in Stormwind.text: Adjacent minions have Windfury.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Farm! No wait… Mine! No wait… 3 to Smith—they're taking Farm. Get there now!

United in Stormwind.name: Best in Shell
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Tradeable Summon two 2/7 _Turtles with Taunt.
United in Stormwind.flavor: The agility course takes a while.

United in Stormwind.name: City Architect
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 0/5 Castle Walls with Taunt.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Oh, wait, I had this turned the wrong way. This was supposed to be a tower."

United in Stormwind.name: Cornelius Roame
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]At the start and end
_of each player's turn,
draw a card.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Raised two perfectly normal daughters. Then one died and brought doom to Stormwind.

United in Stormwind.name: Cowardly Grunt
United in Stormwind.text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Cowardice is the wisest part of valor.

United in Stormwind.name: Entitled Customer
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your hand size to all other minions.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Do you have any idea how much mana I've spent at your store? 6."

United in Stormwind.name: Grey Sage Parrot
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Repeat the last spell you've cast that costs (6) or more.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Nothing is more terrifying than a parrot squawking "Pyroblast!"

United in Stormwind.name: Highlord Fordragon
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give a minion __in your hand +5/+5.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "Through my faith and my courage, I shall be protected. And through my honor and sacrifice, another will rise in my place."

United in Stormwind.name: Lady Prestor
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform minions in your deck into random Dragons. (They keep their __original stats and Cost.)
United in Stormwind.flavor: To her credit, the best bodyguard for the king WOULD be a dragon in disguise.
United in Stormwind.howToGet: Unlocked when opening a United in Stormwind pack.

United in Stormwind.name: Proving Grounds
United in Stormwind.text:
Summon two minions from your deck.
They fight!
United in Stormwind.flavor: 1v1 me on Proving Grounds, DH only, no items, 4 stocks.

United in Stormwind.name: Rats of Extraordinary Size
United in Stormwind.text:
[x]Summon seven 1/1
Rats. Any that can't fit
on the battlefield go to
your hand with +4/+4.
United in Stormwind.flavor: They don't care if you believe they exist.

United in Stormwind.name: Tiny Toys
United in Stormwind.text:
Summon four random 5-Cost minions.
Make them 2/2.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Mom, they're action figures!

United in Stormwind.name: Clumsy Courier
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost spell from your hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Not the nacho cheese!

United in Stormwind.name: Elekk Mount
United in Stormwind.text: Give a minion +4/+7 and Taunt. When it dies, summon an Elekk.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Pink Elekks are on parade!

United in Stormwind.name: Irebound Brute
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each card drawn this turn.
United in Stormwind.flavor: "You don't understand… ogres are an untapped market for vengeance and hatred!"

United in Stormwind.name: Lothar
United in Stormwind.text: At the end of your turn, attack a random enemy minion. If it dies, gain +3/+3.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Has been around since before there were paladins and those newfangled paladin mechs.

United in Stormwind.name: Mr. Smite
United in Stormwind.text: Your Pirates have Charge.
United in Stormwind.flavor: “Please, Mr. Smite was my father. Call me Yorik.”

United in Stormwind.name: SI:7 Assassin
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Costs (1) less for each SI:7 card you've played this game. Combo: Destroy an enemy minion.
United in Stormwind.flavor: You can't keep the streets clean if you're afraid to get your hands dirty.

United in Stormwind.name: Goliath, Sneed's Masterpiece
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Fire five rockets at enemy minions that deal 2 damage each. (You pick the targets!)
United in Stormwind.flavor: “Listen, this baby has blades, rockets, and rocket blades. Only thing it doesn’t have is good gas mileage.”

United in Stormwind.name: Grand Magus Antonidas
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a Fire spell on each of your last three turns, cast 3 Fireballs at ___random enemies.@ (@/3)
United in Stormwind.flavor: He's really disappointed Jaina became a frost mage.

United in Stormwind.name: Jace Darkweaver
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Cast all Fel spells you've played this game (targets enemies if possible).
United in Stormwind.flavor: As a former mage, making the transition from fire to felfire was quite easy.

United in Stormwind.name: Maddest Bomber
United in Stormwind.text: Battlecry: Deal 12 damage randomly split among all other characters.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Talk about a name that limits design space.

United in Stormwind.name: Mo'arg Forgefiend
United in Stormwind.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Gain 8 Armor.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Enraged not by fel energies, but by an itchy nose he cannot scratch.

United in Stormwind.name: Sheldras Moontree
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: The next 3 spells you draw are Cast When Drawn.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Sheldras really went to the park for his pilgrimage.

United in Stormwind.name: Varian, King of Stormwind
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion to gain Rush. Repeat for Taunt and Divine Shield.
United in Stormwind.flavor: Man, this guy is so cool. Sure hope nothing happens to him.
United in Stormwind.howToGetDiamond: Unlockable after purchasing the United in Stormwind Tavern Pass.

United in Stormwind.name: Goldshire Gnoll
United in Stormwind.text: [x]Rush Costs (1) less for each __other card in your hand.
United in Stormwind.flavor: They're searching for one ring. They're pretty sure someone said Goldshire.
